mapper.select: SELECT S.ID UserID , S.UserName , S.EmployeeName , S.AuthCompanyID , AC.AuthCompanyName , '' AS ProjectID , ( SELECT [JobID] + ',' FROM [DBO].[S_JobsUserRel] WHERE AccountID = S.ID FOR XML PATH('') ) JobIds FROM S_Account S INNER JOIN S_AuthCompany AC ON S.AuthCompanyID = AC.ID WHERE S.Status = 1 AND S.IsDel = 0 AND S.UserName = #{userName}
